alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owsley, southwestern Estill, Jackson, northeastern Rockcastle and southwestern Lee Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Donaro, or near Mount Vernon, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goochland, Dango, Threelinks, Ardery and Carico around 530 PM EDT. Loam, Eglon, Collingsworth, Hurley, Sandgap, Shop Branch, Clover Bottom, Middlefork and Kerby Knob around 535 PM EDT. McKee, Waneta, Macedonia, Bradshaw, Brazil, Atkinstown, Gray Hawk, Alcorn and Hisel around 540 PM EDT. Lakes, Wind Cave, Turkey Foot, Foxtown, New Zion, Blanton Flats and Privett around 545 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Arvel, Old Orchard, Banford, Earnestville, Wild Dog, Delvinta, Leighton, Alumbaugh, Drip Rock, Vincent, Heidelberg, Yellow Rock, Caryton, Willow Shoals, Cressmont, Ida May, Pebworth, Evelyn, Levi and Shade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
